name: The World Named Fred
description: In this first-person action-adventure game you play from behind the eyes of Leet Nym, who, at the request of a cat calling itself Mr. Snuggles, embarks on a quest to save an obscenely magical world named Fred.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or later Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: As of now I have played only a part of the story(not that good),but considering it's a low budget game and released about 1 month ago it is understandable. I needed a change to what I've been playing recently and i was not disappointed. Actually the fighting was somewhat enjoyable... :) I would highly recommend this game for under 16's...

As of now I have played only part of the story, but already I can HIGHLY reccomend this game. It has it's flaws, but the game was released literally about 1 month ago, Defo reccomend, kinda funny, loved it, actually had the choice between this or COD:AW, chose this, Buy it.
This game is a wonderful, powerful, majestic acid trip. I like it.
